info.title: Seismic Workspace
info.description: The Seismic workspace connector includes actions related to adding, updating, deleting, and downloading workspace content.

get.summary: Get the comments on a item
get.description: Get the comments on an item along with any replies and annotations.

post.summary: Add a comment on an item
post.description: Add a comment on an item

delete.summary: Delete a comment on an item
delete.description: Delete a comment on an item

delete.summary: Delete a reply to a comment
delete.description: Delete a reply to a comment

post.description: Adds a new subfolder to a specified workspace folder

get.description: Gets the basic information about a folder in workspace.

parameters.name: workspaceFolderId
parameters.description: Id of the folder. Use "root" for the root folder.

patch.description: This endpoint can be used to move or rename a folder.

get.summary: Get list of items in a folder
get.description: Get list of items in a folder.

parameters.name: workspaceFolderId
parameters.description: Id of the folder. Use "root" for the root folder.

post.description: Copies a folder to a specified target folder.

post.summary: Create or get a contextual workspace folder
post.description: Creates a contextual folder or gets the workspaceContentId for a contextual folder if it already exists.
Adds a new file to the Seismic workspace.

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Json Object with 'name', 'parentFolderId' and 'format' like 'ppt' or 'doc'. Example: {"name" : "Big Presentation", "parentFolderId" : "root", "format": "ppt"}

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Only text file supported here, Add any strings to create file.

get.description: Gets the basic information about a file in workspace.

patch.description: This endpoint can be used to move or rename a file.

post.description: Copies a file to a specified target folder.

get.description: Downloads the binary contents of a workspace content.

parameters.name: redirect
parameters.description:
Optional query parameter. Accepts true or false, defaults to true. If true then response is a 302 redirect to download url,
            else a 200 response with download location in response body.

put.description: Adds a new version of an existing workspace file.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Only text file supported here, Add any strings to create file.

post.description: Adds a new URL content item to the workspace.

get.description: Get the basic information about a url in workspace.

patch.description: This endpoint can be used to move or rename a url.

post.description: Copies a Url to a specified target folder.

get.description: Get the basic information about an item in workspace.

patch.description: This endpoint can be used to move or rename an item.

post.description: Copies a item to a specified target folder.

get.summary: Get the list of members on an item
get.description: Gets a full list of members on an item

post.description: Add a member to a folder or file

delete.description: Delete a user for a folder or file

put.description: Transfer the owner of content to a collaborator
put.summary: Transfers the owner of content to a collaborator

get.description: Get custom properties of workspace file which added from doccenter

name.description: The name of the folder you would like to create.

systemType.description: This is typically one of the following: Salesforce, MicrosoftDynamicCRM, Sugar, Oracle.   But there are no restrictions and any string can be used to specify a new system type for custom applications.

contextType.description: This is the singular form of the context such as "Opportunity" or "Account"

contextTypePlural.description: This is the plural form of the context such as "Opportunities" or "Accounts"

contextId.description: The ID of the record in the external system.  For Salesforce we use 18 character record IDs.  For Dynamics we use the record GUID .  For Oracle we use the record number such as 3002.
